elements.name: homeType
elements.title: What is the type of home you live in?

choices.text: My home is located in a licensed manufactured home park
My home is located in a licensed RV Park

completedHtmlOnCondition.html:
• Report Damages to the Logan County EMA.
  • Contact the Ohio Department of Commerce Division of Industrial Compliance at:
    • Phone: (614) 644-2223
    • Email: IC@com.state.oh.us

• Report Damages to the Logan County EMA.
  • Contact the Ohio Department of Health: 614-644-7455

• Report Damages to the Logan County EMA.
  • Contact the Logan County Soil and Water Conservation District to Determine Floodplain info at:
    • Phone: 937-404-3147
    • Email: allison.fowler@oh.nacdnet.net
  • Contact the Logan County Building Authority for any applicable building, gas, and electrical permits at:
    • (937) 592-7473
    • Email: buildinginfo@logancountyohio.gov
  • Contact the Logan County Plumbing Inspector for all plumbing permits at:
    • 937-651-6195
    • cwren@loganhealthohio.gov
  • Contact the Logan County Sewer District for any applicable sewer permits at: (937) 843-3328
  • Contact the Logan County Auditors Office before moving or placing any manufactured home to get all applicable permits at: 937-599-7209
  • Contact the Logan County Health District if you have a well to get a building site review and any applicable well (New, Altered, Abandoned) permits at:
    • 937-651-6205
    • aharshfield@loganhealthohio.gov
